Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: Unique identity identifying the weight statement. An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Weight statement issue date
Element.Description: The date when the weight statement is issued. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD"

Element.Name: Weight statement issue time
Element.Description: The time when the Weight Statement is issued. Format = "hh:mm:ss+timezone". Timezone is optional to use. If omitted, the local timezone where the document was issued should be assumed.

Element.Name: Weight statement type code
Element.Description: 01 = Outbound delivery 02 = Inbound delivery

Element.Name: Sender Party
Element.Description: The party sending this weight statement (e.g. Weighing Station, Shipper, Freight Forwarder, Carrier, ...).

Element.Name: Senders electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the senders partys electronic address

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Sender party identity
Element.Description: The identifier of the Sender party

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The address for the Sender.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The contact of the Sender party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Receiver information
Element.Description: The party receiving this weight statement (e.g. Carrier, Terminal Operator, ...).

Element.Name: Receiver electronic address
Element.Description: Identifies the receivers partys electronic address

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Receiver identity
Element.Description: The identifier of the receiver party

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The address for the Receiver.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The contact of the Sender party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Weighing party information
Element.Description: The party executing the weight measure (e.g. Weighing Station).

Element.Name: Party Identification
Element.Description: An identifier for this party.

Element.Name: Weighing party identity
Element.Description: The identifier of the Weighing party

Element.Name: Weighing party name
Element.Description: The name of the weighing party

Element.Name: Physical Location
Element.Description: The physical location of this party.

Element.Name: Physical Location ID
Element.Description: Unique ID of the site for the weighing party. If possile an ID that is issued by a authority or similar.

Element.Name: Location name
Element.Description: Physical location name

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The address for the Weighing party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: Post code

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The contact of the Sender party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Shipper Party
Element.Description: The party transporting or shipping the items.

Element.Name: Shipping party identity
Element.Description: The identifier of the shippping party

Element.Name: Shipper name
Element.Description: The name of the shipper

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The address for the Shipper party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact person name
Element.Description: The contact of the Sender party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Shipment identity
Element.Description: Use NA if no specific shipment ID is available

Element.Name: Goods Item
Element.Description: A goods item included in this shipment.

Element.Name: Line item identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the Line Item assigned by the weighing partner, the identifier must be unique within the order

Element.Name: Item
Element.Description: Product information relating to a goods item

Element.Name: Item name
Element.Description: Name of weighed item
Element.Value: Sortering 0/2 mm krossat bergmaterial CE-m√§rkt enligt system 2+ f√∂r anv√§ndning till asfalt.

Element.Name: Buyers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the buyer, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the buyers system.

Element.Name: The Sellers item identifier
Element.Description: An identifier, assigned by the seller, for the item. Associates the item with its identification according to the sellers system.

Element.Name: Item standard identifier
Element.Description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) or other standardized identification. Associates the item with its identification according to a standard system.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item standard identifier

Element.Name: Commodity classification
Element.Description: To classify when an item number is not sufficient.

Element.Name: Item classification code
Element.Description: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature. Classification codes are used to allow grouping of similar items for a various purposes e.g. public procurement (CPV), e-Commerce (UNSPSC) etc.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the Item classification identifier.

Attribute.Name: Item classification identifier version identification scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme version identifier of the Item classification identifier

Attribute.Name: Clear text name equivalent of classification code
Attribute.Description: The textual equivalent of the code value

Element.Name: Measurement Dimension
Element.Description: Used to specify weight and/or volume of the Goods Item.

Element.Name: Attribute identifier
Element.Description: To describe the type of measurement. Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure
Element.Description: For the measure.

Attribute.Name: Measure unit of measure
Attribute.Description: The unit of measure that applies to the measure.
